name: Voice-A-Greeting
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Cant get home for the Holiday. Send family and friends a Holiday Greeting to play on their Alexa Device. PLEASE NOTE: The receiver of your greeting must own the Amazon Echo or Echo Dot device in order to play your greeting.
